Mail Title 01: Cleared a path to the back of the farm cave.
Mail Text 01: Dear, @.^^Dimitrius had once told me that there was a path to a cave on the farm that would take him further in, but it was boarded up.^I know it's selfish, but I had to make a quick stop on my way home from work yesterday to remove the boards!^There was something strange about it, but that was...^Well, use it for good!^^-Robin
